ms_copies_parts: Naples, Conservatorio. Two copies: 22.2.10, 'Quartetto no. 1...' and 22.5.6, 'Quartetto no. 1... per uso di S. E. Abbate de Antonio Giorgio'
Prague, Národní Muzeum, XXII. B.57, 'Divertimento a quattro...' (first two movements only)

entries.notes: Op. 8 no. 1 of 1769 ('opera grande') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue.

continues_from_previous.notes: Modern edition: 1953, Milan, Ricordi: Op. 1 no. 6 (pocket score; revised by Enrico Polo). Arrangements: (A) Of the first movement, as part of a sonata for harpsichord (or pianoforte or harp) and violin, perhaps by Naderman, c. 1778 (see No. 49). (B) Of the third movement, for a string orchestra, by Marescalchi(?), c. 1775(?) (see No. 509).
